title: The Exploration Company Confirms First Mission Possible Customer
summary: Hungarian space company Genesis SFL has announced that it has secured a spot aboard The Exploration Company’s Mission Possible demonstrator, making it the mission’s first confirmed customer. Mission Possible is The Exploration Company’s second subscale prototype of its Nyx Earth spacecraft. Once operational, it will ferry cargo and possibly even crew to and from low […]

title: NASA says it is “evaluating all options” for the safe return of Starliner crew

title: Space industry considers implications of Harris as presidential candidate
summary: The sudden ascendance of Vice President Kamala Harris as the presumptive Democratic nominee for president will likely have at least a modest impact on space policy, including a potential choice of her running mate.

title: SES searching for cost savings to tackle video woes
